channel.title: Vb question
channel.description: what code can i use to make it so the the application i made stays on top no matter what you press???

item.title: Vb question
item.dc:creator: @hellou hellou
item.description:
@hellou wrote:

or in a form:-

SetWindowPos Me.hwnd, -1, 0, 0, 0, 0, &H1 Or &H2

and moudle:-

Declare Function SetWindowPos Lib “user32” (ByVal hwnd As Long, ByVal hWndInsertAfter As Long, ByVal x As Long, ByVal y As Long, ByVal cx As Long, ByVal cy As Long, ByVal wFlags As Long) As Long

Read full topic

item.title: Vb question
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

this is what i used

[code]
Private Declare Function SetWindowPos Lib “user32” (ByVal hwnd As Long, ByVal hWndInsertAfter As Long, ByVal x As Long, ByVal y As Long, ByVal cx As Long, ByVal cy As Long, ByVal wFlags As Long) As Long
Private Const SWP_NOMOVE = &H2
Private Const SWP_NOSIZE = &H1
Private Const HWND_TOPMOST = -1
Private Const HWND_NOTOPMOST = -2

Private Sub Form_Load()

    SetWindowPos hwnd, _
        HWND_TOPMOST, 0, 0, 0, 0, _
        SWP_NOMOVE + SWP_NOSIZE

End Sub[/code]

hope this helpes

Read full topic
